name: Joe Fixit
text: Smashing things — Response: After you engage a minion, deal 2 damage to that minion. (Limit once per phase.) Fixing things — Response: After you reveal a side scheme, remove 1[per_hero] threat from that scheme. (Limit once per phase.) Don't move!

name: Bruce Banner
text: Fragmented mind — You may include up to 8 cards which cost 1 or less in your deck from an aspect other than your own. Forced Response: After you flip to this form, discard an upgrade you control.

name: Mister Fixit Flat
text: Alter-Ego Interrupt: When you flip to Alter-Ego form, exhaust Mister Fixit Flat → heal 1 damage from your identity. Shuffle 1 identity-specific upgrade from your discard pile into your deck. Any player may trigger this ability. “Make yourself confortable” —Mister Fixit

name: Mister Berengetti
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Mister Berengetti → draw 2 cards. Choose and discard 2 cards from your hand. “It's fine Joe. Thank you.” —Mister Berengetti

name: Dealing with roblems
text: Hero Response: After you defeat a side scheme, exhaust Dealing with problems → draw 1 card. Remove 1 threat from the main scheme. What do you want Banner?” —Mister Fixit

name: Smashing the Problems
text: Hero Response: After you defeat an enemy, exhaust Smashing the Problems → draw 1 card. Deal 2 damage to the villain. "If you ask me, I prefer the word... Incredible!” —Mister Fixit

name: Resilience
text: Your identity gains steady and gets +4 hit points. "Ow. Kidding." —Mister Fixit

name: Fast Recovery
text: Hero Action: Exhaust Fast Recovery → heal 2 damage from your identity. "Kiss me, I'll rip yer head clean off” —Mister Fixit

name: The Troubles Are Coming
text: Hero Action: Exhaust The Troubles are Coming → search the encounter deck for a side scheme or a minion. Reveal that card → draw 3 cards then discard 1 card from your hand. Ready Mister Fixit. (shuffle the encounter deck).

name: Just Smile
text: Hero Resource: Exhaust Just Smile → generate a [wild] resource.

name: None of Your Business
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If this removes the last threat on that scheme, draw 1 card. “Are you sure about this?”

name: Up to rumble
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If this attack defeats that enemy, draw 1 card.

name: Always Up
text: Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Ready Joe Fixit. Draw 3 cards. “I'll expect you'll make good on it.” —Mister Fixit
